parameters.query: SELECT marketing_description, bedrooms, bathrooms, advertised_rent, application_fee, sqft, unit_address, default_deposit, appliances, property_link FROM all_rental_properties WHERE unit_name = '{{ $json["body"]["unit_name"] }}';

parameters.text: =Create a property description from the following information.  {{ $json.propertyData.property_name }}, {{ $json.propertyData.advertised_rent }}, {{ $json.propertyData.bedrooms }}, {{ $json.propertyData.bathrooms }}, {{ $json.propertyData.marketing_description }}, {{ $json.propertyData.appliances }}.
